text: "Somebody's Doin' Me Right" is a song written by J. Fred Knobloch, Paul Overstreet and Dan Tyler, and recorded by American country music artist Keith Whitley. It was posthumously released in January 1992 as the second single from his album Kentucky Bluebird. The song reached number 15 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Other versions== It was previously released by Glen Campbell on his 1991 album Unconditional Love. ==Personnel== * Eddie Bayers — drums * Paul Franklin — steel guitar * Brent Mason — electric guitar * Dave Pomeroy — bass guitar * Billy Sanford — acoustic guitar * Dennis Wilson — background vocals * Curtis Young — background vocals ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1992) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:1992 singles Category:Glen Campbell songs Category:Keith Whitley songs Category:Songs written by J. Fred Knobloch Category:Songs written by Paul Overstreet Category:Songs written by Dan Tyler Category:Song recordings produced by Garth Fundis Category:RCA Records singles Category:Songs released posthumously Category:1991 songs
title: Somebody's Doin' Me Right
